songs.title: Yes I Am
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Sexy lady, knows what she wants out of life
See, she got her own needs
Doing whatever she likes

[Pre-Chorus]
Feels good to have you
She don’t need you
She can’t depend on a man
After all that she’s been through
She isn't running behind you
Trust me, I know, because I am her

[Chorus]
And I got what I need right here
It’s in me
I am everything
All that I need, and I won’t be defeated
I won’t stop now
Got it all figured out
And I got what I need right here
I’m everything I am
Yes, I am, yes, I am
Yes, I am, yes, I am

[Verse 2]
So you can’t be mad that
She had the strength to survive
Through the good and the bad
She’s having the time of her life

[Pre-Chorus]
Feels good to have you
She don’t need you
She can’t depend on a man
After all that she’s been through
She isn't running behind you
Trust me I know because I am her

[Chorus]
And I got what I need right here
It’s in me
I am everything
All that I need and I won’t be defeated
I won’t stop now
Got it all figured out
And I got what I need right here
I’m everything I am
Yes, I am, yes, I am

[Post-Chorus]
You are, if you are throw your hands up
(So put your hands up)
If you are, let me see your hands up

[Chorus]
And I got what I need right here
It’s in me
I am everything
All that I need and I won’t be defeated
I won’t stop now
Got it all figured out
And I got what I need right here
I’m everything I am
Yes, I am, yes, I am
Yes, I am, yes, I am

[Outro]
If you are throw your hands up
If you are, let me see your hands up
